ConfigurationOption.Value: select wo.wonum, wo.description, wo.status, sd.maxvalue, wo.assetnum, wo.location, wo.glaccount, wo.siteid, wo.orgid, wo.workorderid from workorder wo join synonymdomain sd on wo.status = sd.value and sd.domainid = 'WOSTATUS' where wo.historyflag = 0 and wo.istask = 0 and sd.maxvalue not in ( 'CAN', 'CLOSE', 'HISTEDIT' )

List.ListEntry: wo.location in (select location from locancestor where ancestor = '${MX_WORK_LOCATION}' and siteid = '${MX_CURRENT_SITE}' )
